title: Login Issues
description: User cannot log into their account. Password reset not working.

title: Payment Processing Error
description: Credit card payment fails during checkout process. Error code 500.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Users requesting dark mode theme for better user experience.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: Application experiencing database connection timeouts during peak hours.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: iOS app crashes when uploading large files. Occurs on iPhone 12 and newer.

title: Email Notification Not Working
description: Users not receiving email notifications for password reset and account updates.

title: API Rate Limiting Issues
description: Third-party integrations hitting rate limits causing service disruptions.

title: Security Vulnerability Report
description: Potential XSS vulnerability found in user input fields. Needs immediate attention.

title: UI Layout Issues on Mobile
description: Mobile interface elements overlapping on smaller screen sizes.

title: Data Export Feature Request
description: Users requesting ability to export their data in CSV format.
